F

fire(Vector2) - Method in class com.berbils.game.Entities.FireEngines.FireEngine
Calls the fire method of the Weapon attached to the fire engine, spawning projectiles in the direction of the co-ords passed.Also updates water resource to mimic consumption.
fire() - Method in class com.berbils.game.Entities.Towers.Tower
If the tower is alive and can fire, it fires a projectile towards a target

fireDelay - Variable in class com.berbils.game.Entities.ProjectileSpawners.Weapon
The amount of time required where the weapon can not attack, to match the fire rate per second

FireEngine - Class in com.berbils.game.Entities.FireEngines
A class used to generate Box Entitys and a sprite with in built resources used as limitations such as ammo for firing projectiles or health
FireEngine(PlayScreen, Vector2, Weapon, int, float, int, String) - Constructor for class com.berbils.game.Entities.FireEngines.FireEngine
This constructor assigns required variables and sets up the weapon class instance for use.It only creates a fixture and body definition, no sprite, body or fixture generation.

FireStation - Class in com.berbils.game.Entities.FireStation

FireStation(PlayScreen, Vector2, Vector2, String) - Constructor for class com.berbils.game.Entities.FireStation.FireStation
